mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART(MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, CART_QUANTITY) VALUES (#{memberId},#{productId},#{cartQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_CART WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT TC.CART_ID,TI.IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_PRICE,TC.CART_QUANTITY,TP.PRODUCT_STOCK FROM TBL_CART TC INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP on TP.PRODUCT_ID = TC.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN TBL_IMAGES TI on TP.PRODUCT_ID = TI.PRODUCT_ID WHERE TC.MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
